about_the_game:
Content Explanation about the Demo Version:

In the demo version, players can experience the complete plot chapters and core mechanics. The gameplay duration of the plot is approximately 10 hours. The core gameplay mechanics are available.

Some of the classes in the demo are still being opened up. Only the Barbarian, Wizard, and Valkyrie are available for now. The related class builds are also available simultaneously.

Only part of the content such as costumes in the demo has been actually implemented. The character level can reach up to 99.

Authentic Dark style, classic ARPG combat mode, allowing multiplayer to have a great time. Its features include a magnificent "Hack & Slash" combat system, billions of rich equipment, combined with distinctive skills, which can be combined into ever-changing class builds (BUILD), enabling you to fully enjoy the refreshing grinding experience and reap the rewards of exciting drops.

The minimalist operation mode, like lively musical notes, strikes up the prelude to combat; the precise combat commands, like sharp sword blades, point the way to victory; the powerful action performance, like brilliant fireworks, blooms with the splendor of combat. Together, they create an unparalleled sense of combat impact. The rich combat skills, like magnificent paintings, showcase the colorful combat styles; the diverse builds, like a brilliant starry sky, present numerous different visual feasts.

The billions of pieces of equipment and distinctive skills can be cleverly combined to form countless class builds. You are the master of the N + 10086th way to defeat the bosses. Seamless switching, free and as you like, you can shoot from a distance, hack and slash up close, or go "biubiubiu"~ The way to play is entirely up to you, do whatever you want!

Free! Free! Free! It's important, so I'll say it three times! You read it right.

All equipment, affixes, crafting materials, and attribute upgrades are based on loot drops and do not need to be obtained through payment. Build your own exclusive combat build. Rarer equipment and loot can only be obtained through continuous looting. You can also use the trading post to verify the value of the loot you've obtained.

The original Dark style, but not retro, enjoy high-definition graphics.

  • Endless Play
    The real fun of the game can only be officially experienced starting from level 60. The game operates on a seasonal basis, and each season will offer new fun, new goals, and new rewards.

  • Endless Challenge
    In the world of SERAPH, there are endless ways to become stronger. Players can verify their abilities by challenging 副本玩法 such as the Void Otherworld, Chaos Dungeons, and Ladder Trials, and obtain various equipment, and personalize their combat abilities to the limit.

  • Endless Pursuit
    The pursuit of the types and affixes of various equipment and items is never-ending. Most importantly, one needs to find the items and the combination of affixes that match their own playing style and chosen class among countless item types and affixes to obtain diverse experiences and the fun of rewards.

  • Endless Surprise
    In the mysterious SERAPH world, players will constantly encounter various unexpected events and challenges during the exploration process, and upon completion, they will obtain unexpectedly powerful equipment or precious items.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: SERAPH : In the Darkness is a classic dark fantasy. It's an action role-playing game (ARPG) with hack-and-slash combat mechanics, allowing for item customization tailored to your playstyle. Experience new thrills in the world of SERAPH, where aesthetics of darkness and fear combine
